name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 9, a fire broke out in the Hardware City in Zhongshan, Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why is food safety not strictly managed, but film and television works are strictly censored?
Answer: Because if there are problems with food, it is us who are at risk; if there are problems with film and television works, it is them who are at risk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Shenzhen Futian Xiangqi Building, migrant workers demanded their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhihu Question: Why does the social atmosphere feel so strange recently?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A 2020 paper showed that among the 51 infant formulas sold on the Chinese market in 2018, 17 were found to contain mineral oil hydrocarbons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10 (Release) Hubei Enshi. A netizen posted a video saying that he had previously found a fecal suction truck with the words "water delivery truck" pasted on its body. The netizen replied "Bacillus and hygiene"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Shantou, Guangdong. A netizen posted a video saying that his 16-year-old son Fang Shiming was tricked out by two men from the same village on July 6 and strangled to death in a corner of the school woods. Afterwards, the murderer left, and the village committee did not inform the family until the body was taken to the funeral home. The village committee said the surveillance camera at the crime scene was broken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2017, the People's Daily Overseas Edition reported that a Taiwanese political and economic program revealed a "hot news": the mainland uses coal oil to fry dough sticks.
After the media recently exposed that tankers mixed edible oil, some netizens returned to this post for "archaeology". One netizen replied: I thought it was a joke before, but now I find it is a boomerang.
As of now, the post can no longer be found on the People's Daily Overseas Edition Weibo homepage, and the original link has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 10, Zhejiang. Netizens posted a video saying that a special tanker truck for edible oil entered a chemical plant.
Public information shows that Zhejiang Richeng New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. belongs to the chemical raw materials and chemical products manufacturing industry, and its business scope includes: refining agent, mercerizing soap, detergent, dispersant, refining aid, silk refining agent, etc.
https://t.co/pkSMAH4PmO

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, it was reported online that the Changsha Locomotive Depot of the Railway required the families of employees to sign a safety guarantee agreement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 9, NetEase News interviewed a tank truck operator: China National Grain and Oils Corporation’s response is purely an attempt to shirk responsibility. If the supervision is not strict, the goods can be loaded on any truck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, several edible oil brands’ live broadcast rooms explained to netizens and denied any involvement in the mixed tanker truck incident. Among them, the anchor of Luhua edible oil flagship store drank oil on the spot to prove its quality under the attention of thousands of people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Chongqing. A government vehicle forced a lane change and scraped against another vehicle. The driver said, "I have something to do now, I'll come (to deal with it) tomorrow." The person who filmed the video said that the accident needed to be dealt with immediately, while the government vehicle driver cursed, "I can't deal with it for you." The traffic police kept persuading the government vehicle driver to leave a phone number, but the driver was still unwilling to leave a phone number on the grounds that "I admit that I am fully responsible."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to media reports, a chemical cooking oil company involved in the incident had been involved in the supply of canteens at many universities in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, in the context of the 20-year equality of chemical edible oil, it should not be a big deal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10 (Release), Dazhou, Sichuan. The owners of Diwang Plaza Community posted a video saying that Wang Qiao, deputy secretary of the Party branch of Liujiang Middle School, served as the former director of the property management committee and secretary of the Party branch in the community. On July 6, an owner came to Wang Qiao to discuss community matters, and Wang Qiao "beat up the community owner." The video shows that there is blood on the mouth and nose of the beaten person. The surrounding owners said, "Wang Qiao beat him up. Wang Qiao is the bully in our community."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 9, China Daily reported: Worried about the further deterioration of the domestic political environment, more and more Americans are considering moving abroad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, a reporter from China Business Network confirmed that the track of the tanker truck is currently unable to be tracked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fishery practitioners said: In fact, every industry has an open secret. Many industries are cutting prices and saving costs in invisible places. It seems to be flourishing, but in fact it is rotten.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, after the media exposed that tank trucks were mixed with edible oil, Pang Donglai's self-operated edible oil was sought after by consumers. On July 10, videos posted by many Henan netizens showed that many people rushed to Pang Donglai to buy.
A Pang Donglai purchasing agent said: Pang Donglai's peanut oil is out of stock. Pang Donglai (Xuchang Times Square Store) supermarket customer service said: Peanut oil is sold out, and sunflower oil is only enough for sale for a few hours, and it is expected to be out of stock for a week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10, Guiyang, Guizhou. Some netizens posted that the third-grade Chinese test paper in Guanshanhu District was all about culture and tourism, questioning whether there was a "transfer of interests" with the Culture and Tourism Bureau. The test paper content showed that the Chinese test paper was divided into four sections, and the test questions were all based on Guiyang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 9 (interview) An informed intermediary said that the black intermediary first used high salaries as bait to attract a large number of summer workers, and then lied that the original high-salary factory had been full and needed to transfer to other factories, with wages as low as 6 to 9 yuan. Many summer workers had no return travel expenses and could only enter the factory with low wages. "Calling the police is useless"
https://t.co/XNYtprOjxd

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a newspaper for primary and secondary school students, "Sunshine Youth Newspaper", has become a best-seller online. The newspaper covers major domestic and international events, culture, scientific innovation, etc., and is divided into a youth edition and a junior high school edition.
